QuestData.Title: Acid Rain
QuestData.Description: Since you've been gone, more and more of these creatures are approaching our camp. They appear to be amassing for a major assault!$b$bWe're going to have to take some drastic measures if we hope to see tomorrow.$b$bHere, take my poisoned throwing stars and figure out a way to thin out their numbers.
QuestData.LogDescription: Using the Recovered Gyrocopter, kill 25 Hozen Gutrippers and 25 Hozen Nibstabbers.
